definitions.definition: Having happened a short while ago .
Having done something a short while ago that distinguishes them as what they are called.
examples: The cause has several hundred recent donors.
I met three recent graduates at the conference.

definitions.definition: Particularly in geology, palaeontology, and astronomy: having occurred a relatively short time ago, but still potentially thousands or even millions of years ago.

main_definition: Having happened a short while ago .
secondary_definitions: Having done something a short while ago that distinguishes them as what they are called.
( sciences ) Particularly in geology, palaeontology, and astronomy: having occurred a relatively short time ago, but still potentially thousands or even millions of years ago.
